item.title: Switching between Python and R
item.description: This is a picture from the National Geographic museum in Washington, D.C.. Itâ€™s a picture of a wall in the museum that is covered in a ton of different magazine covers. I love the variety of colors and topics. Reticulate is a super helpful tool if you need to go between Python and R. Say you want to load a data set in python but manipulate it with dplr functions in RStudio; reticulate is the tool for you!
